sentence.Network_en: She has built up an enviable reputation as a harpist.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已经成为一名颇有名望的竖琴演奏家.

sentence.Network_en: The harpist brought on two chairs to perform on.
sentence.Network_cn: 竖琴师拿出两个凳子,在上面表演.

sentence.Network_en: And first, I want a harpist, and then a string quartet.
sentence.Network_cn: 一开始, 我要竖琴, 后来又换成了弦乐四重奏.

list.abs: content abstract : long , long ago , old pat , a kind-hearted harpist , and his ill-spirited companion , young tom , set off for a contest to name the finest harpist in all of ireland .内容简介：很久很久以前，善良的竖琴师老帕特和他邪恶的同伴年轻的汤姆动身前往一场选拔全爱尔兰最棒的竖琴师的比赛。
像我们这个城市里不定期周末举行"竖琴手"(harpists)的联谊会，就是大家搬着自己大大小小的琴到聚会地点，表演独奏，或是合奏， …

entry.def: A harpist is someone who plays the harp.

auth_sentence.content: One of its best features is the British composer Graham Fitkin's score, played live by the Scottish harpist Ruth Wall.

auth_sentence.content: Last year, Welsh harpist Catrin Finch hosted the Welsh evening at the event, featuring the bands Mabon, 9bach and Calan.
